title: Ruined "Neat!" Theme
excerpt: [digg=http://www.digg.com/design/Ruined_Neat_Theme]Whoever makes the theme called “Neat!” on WordPress, which I have used for this blog for so long, has just ruined it entirely. They have added really stupid looking flowers to the sidebar (see below). I think I’m going to change themes now because of it. I figure a mostly tech blog doesn’t need flowers … more →
